name: FLIP (itch) (DatBoiChonkey)
description:
FLIP Is A Platformer Where If You Die You Change Dimensions! The Only Way To Beat A Level Is To Collect All The Coins However some Coins Are In The Other Dimension Therefore To Beat The Game You NEED To Die!

Controls: A & D / Arrow Keys To Move, Space To Jump

Remember The End Flag Of Each Level Is ALWAYS On The Overworld / The Regular Dimension.
